body.p: DocBook V5 document typeassociation rulesA file is considered to be a DocBook 5 document when the namespace is http://docbook.org/ns/docbook.

DocBook V5 document typeschemaThe default schema that is used if one is not detected in the DocBook 5 file is docbookxi.rng and it is stored in [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/docbook/5.0/rng/. Other types of schemas are also located in various folders inside the [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/docbook/5.0/ directory (for example, XML Schema files are located in the xsd folder).
The default CSS files used for rendering DocBook content in Author mode is stored in [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/docbook/css/.
DocBook V5 document typeAuthor extensionscatalogsThe default XML catalog, catalog.xml, is stored in [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/docbook/5.0/.
body.note: A default XML catalog and schema files for experimental DocBook 5.1 documents are also available in the [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/docbook/5.1/ directory.
body.p: To watch our video demonstration about editing DocBook documents, go to .
